hero_slogan: I blend design and performance to bring ideas to life with React, Tailwind, and creativity.
about_paragraph_intro: Passionate Full-Stack Developer, specialized in the
about_paragraph_experience: elegant and intuitive interfaces that leave an impact.
skills_desc_frontend: I create smooth, intuitive, and accessible web and mobile interfaces, focusing on user experience and aesthetics.
skills_desc_backend: I develop server-side architecture, RESTful APIs, and manage databases (NoSQL/SQL) to ensure performance.
skills_desc_tools: Mastery of collaboration tools, version control (Git), and continuous deployment workflows for a professional process.
skills_desc_design: I design visual prototypes and closely collaborate with product/design teams to turn ideas into reality.
experience_intro: Tracing my path, from training to concrete achievements.

exp1.title: Front-End Developer & Integrator | La Rosette, Mananara
exp1.task1: Front-end development and integration for complete school management.
exp1.task2: Advanced modules: student management, tuition, grades, invoices (PDF conversion and printing).
exp1.task3: Employee management, dynamic dashboard with monthly profit/loss charts.
exp1.task4: Use of advanced filters and responsive design for all interfaces.

exp2.title: Front-End Developer | Magic Lavage, Mananara
exp2.task1: Created a web app for full management of a car wash center and staff.
exp2.task2: Order tracking, scheduling, and client/employee history.
exp2.task3: Frontend deployment on Netlify with Firebase for database and authentication.

exp3.title: Front-End Developer & Integrator | Itakalo Mobile App
exp3.task2: UX/UI optimization and performance tuning for different mobile resolutions.
exp3.task3: Mobile app for selling, exchanging, and donating items.

exp4.title: Full-Stack MERN & Electron Developer | Trifako (Waste Sorting Management)
exp4.task1: Full-stack development: backend with Express.js & MongoDB, frontend with Electron.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
exp4.task2: Created a dynamic dashboard with charts and advanced filters.
exp4.task3: Integrated a Madagascar map for zone tracking (OpenMap/Leaflet).
exp4.task4: Advanced search and weather API integration.
